original_text: Watch yourselves, so that you may not lose what we have worked for, but may win a full reward.
korean_text: 너희는 스스로 삼가 우리가 일한 것을 잃지 말고 오직 온전한 상을 받으라

sentences.original_text: so that you may not lose what we have worked for,
but may win a full reward.
sentences.korean_translation: 오히려 온전한 상을 받게 하려 함이라.
